data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Dryinus Latreille, 1804 (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea, Dryinidae) from Iran, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Derafshan, Hossein Ali, Rakhshani, Ehsan, Olmi, Massimo (2016): A review of the genus Dryinus Latreille, 1804 (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea, Dryinidae) from Iran, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4117 (3): 411-420, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.3.8
